name: Wild Gorilla Simulator 2016: Survival Life of Ape Vs Hunters & Wildlife Animals
name_original: Wild Gorilla Simulator 2016: Survival Life of Ape Vs Hunters & Wildlife Animals
description: Have you ever wanted to know how it feels to live in the wildlife and experience the life of the king of the jungle? Well here is your chance, go on download Wild Gorilla Simulator 2016 to take control of the great Ape and live the life of a Gorilla. Packed with HD 3D Graphics, addictive storyline, multiple missions and a realistic simulation experience like never before, you are bound to love this game. Get ready to act like a Gorilla in the jungle, searching for food, thwarting away hunters, wood cutters and lumberjacks. Fight for your family against other Gorilla tribes and keep away the hippos while they try to take over your habitat.
